citation.article-title: Serinibacter salmoneus gen. nov., sp. nov., an actinobacterium isolated from the intestinal tract of a fish, and emended descriptions of the families Beutenbergiaceae and Bogoriellaceae
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the family Bogoriellaceae Schumann and Stackebrandt 2000, emend. Zhi et al. 2009

The pattern of 16S rRNA gene sequence signatures consists of nucleotides at positions 144:178 (U–G), 293:304 (G–U), 479 (U), 602:636 (C–G), 668:738 (A–U), 1003:1038 (G–C), 1027:1034 (C–G) and 1409:1491 (C–G).
The family contains the type genus Bogoriella (Groth et al., 1997) as well as the genus Georgenia (Altenburger et al., 2002).
